Text:
Thanks for the file and seeding it.

A slight correction; no matter what it might say in the synopsis or in this version of the facts, but the body used was not of a dead soldier, but from a man rather down on his luck who died of pneumonia from living on the streets.  His father agreed to give his body to MI6 but did not know what it would be used for.

Actually, the body was chosen because the person's parents had both died and was in good condition. He also committed suicide using rat poison
Source: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/magazine-11887115

Thank you uploader.
If anyone wants to know about the truth behind this film - look for the BBC documentary 'operation mincemeat'
